01.desc: Vote {} Recorded. To get a new screen, run {}twowevent vote.

02.desc: You have been signed up, you may now view the event channel for more information.

01.desc: Your screen name has an invalid length, please make sure it matches the one you were given exactly.

02.desc: Your screen name is invalid due to a non-matching checksum value, please make sure it matches the one you were given exactly.

01.desc: You have previously already signed up for this event.
The current status is not voting, so you may not vote right now.

02.desc: Signups have ended, you may not sign up right now.
